item.title: Transcript Text Editor and Proofreader - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled text editor and proofreader to work on the transcript of an eight-classes acting video course. The ideal candidate should have strong attention to detail and proficiency in English grammar and spelling to proofread and correct the transcripts as they were written by a non-native English speaker. The main responsibilities will include editing and proofreading the transcript to ensure accuracy and consistency in language usage. This is a great opportunity for someone with excellent language skills and an eye for detail to contribute to a creative educational project.

Word count: approximately 16,000

Skills required:

- Strong attention to detail
- Proficiency in English grammar and spelling
- Excellent editing and proofreading skills
- Ability to work collaboratively
- Familiarity with educational video content

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 27, 2024 03:00 UTC
Category: Proofreading
Skills:Proofreading, English, Error Detection
Skills: Proofreading, English, Error Detection
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Shorts Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a video editor with proficient English skills to creatively condense our technology How-To videos into engaging YouTube Shorts. Only applications with a video sample submission will be considered.

To apply, please create and submit a Short using this video as your source material: https://youtu.be/CpRgkU2UtJg?si=gLAkNKNp74hwu18H

Criteria for a Successful Short:

The Short should clearly demonstrate one of the methods from the How-To video.
Efficiently re-frame shots, zoom in on crucial details, and employ graphics to enhance understanding and engagement.
Any text overlays must be grammatically correct and should effectively highlight key points.

The budget for each Short created is between $5 to $7.

The selected candidates will initially be tasked with creating Shorts for a list of 10 videos. Upon mutual satisfaction with the quality and terms of the initial project, there is potential to extend the collaboration for additional videos during a longer period.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 27, 2024 02:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Posting and Optimization - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a skilled freelancer to assist with posting videos to YouTube and optimizing them for maximum visibility. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of YouTube's algorithms and best practices for video optimization. Responsibilities will include uploading videos, creating engaging titles and descriptions, selecting appropriate tags and keywords, and implementing SEO strategies to improve video rankings. Successful candidates should have experience in video marketing and a proven track record of increasing engagement and views on YouTube. Knowledge of YouTube Ads and the ability to create and manage ad campaigns is a plus.

Relevant skills include:
- YouTube video uploading and optimization
- Understanding of YouTube algorithms
- Video marketing expertise
- SEO knowledge
- YouTube Ads campaign management

Budget: $150

Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing
Skills: YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing
Country: United States

item.title: Videographer Advice for Sony a7 ii - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking someone experienced with video settings and lighting to help improve the quality of my YouTube videos. I use a Sony A7 II camera and need assistance optimizing my current lighting and room setup to achieve the best possible video quality.

What You'll Do:
- Evaluate my current video and lighting setup
- Recommend the best camera settings for my Sony A7 II
- Advise on lighting adjustments and room modifications to enhance video quality
- Provide tips and tricks to consistently produce high-quality videos

How to Apply:
Please send a link to some of your best video footage along with a brief description of your experience with video settings and lighting.

This should be a simple enough job for any experienced videographer.

Looking forward to working with you. Respond with ready as the first word of your reply. I can't wait for you to make my YouTube videos look their best!

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 27, 2024 02:34 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography
Skills: Videography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Long Term video editor - Upwork
item.description:
Company: Content Solution Agency

Location: Toronto, Canada

Job Description:

Content Solution Agency, based in Toronto, Canada, is seeking a talented and creative video editor for a long-term collaboration. We typically produce 4-7 videos weekly for clients predominantly in the roofing, construction, and real estate industries.

Responsibilities:

Edit 4-7 videos per week
Implement creative edits, including sound effects such as swooshes, clicks, and claps
Ensure all videos meet quality standards and client specifications
Complete projects within 1-2 days of receiving raw footage from drones and cameras
Qualifications:

Proven experience in video editing with a portfolio of previous work
Strong creative skills and the ability to enhance videos beyond basic cuts and transitions
Ability to work under tight deadlines and deliver high-quality results
Familiarity with editing videos for construction, roofing, and real estate industries is a plus
Preferred Skills:

Proficiency with video editing software
Experience with sound design and implementing sound effects
Budget:

$15 per video
Current project budget: $75 for 5 videos
How to Apply:

Please review the example edits we are looking for here.

Submit your application along with a portfolio of your work. Note that we are not looking for talking head video editors. Only candidates with relevant experience will be considered.

Thank you for your interest!

Budget: $75
Posted On: June 27, 2024 02:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Audio Editing
Country: Poland
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Instagram Reel Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced Instagram Reel editor to join our team on a freelance basis.. As an editor, you will be responsible for creating engaging and eye-catching Reels that align with our brand and target audience. You must have a strong understanding of Instagram trends, be able to work with tight deadlines, and have a creative eye for detail.

  Responsibilities:
  - Edit and produce high-quality Instagram Reels, each approximately 20-60 seconds long.
  - Collaborate with our content team to develop creative concepts
  - Stay up-to-date with the latest Instagram trends and editing techniques
  - Enhance video content by adding music, sound effects, graphics, and other elements to increase viewer engagement.
   - Ensure all content is optimized for the best visual quality and complies with Instagram’s specifications.
   - Manage and adhere to a content schedule to ensure timely delivery of all Reels.

  Requirements:
  - Proven experience as an Instagram Reel editor
  - Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere
     Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
  - Strong attention to detail
  - Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines
  - Strong portfolio showcasing creative video editing skills.
  - Strong understanding of current social media trends and
     techniques for maximizing viewer engagement on Instagram.

If you are a creative and skilled Instagram Reel editor who is passionate about creating engaging content, we would love to hear from you, please message me "I'm interested" and we'll continue to chat. Please provide samples of your previous work.

Hourly Range: $7.00-$14.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 02:31 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Shorts Producer Needed - Upwork
item.description:
I am a podcaster.  i produce episodes in audio format.

i need someone to take my audio files and create shorts from them that i can publish on youtube and tiktok to gain more audiance.

the podcasts are usually over 1 hour long.  i can tell you which timeline to extract for shorts.

you will need to get relavent images that must be royalty free and use them on the short.  for example, if the audio is talking about Amazon, then you will need to get images related to Amazon to create the video.

please provide:

1-  your past work.
2- how much you will charge per 30-40 second short.

any proposal that does not include past work and rate per short will not be considered.

thank you.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 27, 2024 02:27 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Audio Editing, YouTube Marketing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, YouTube Development
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Audio Editing, YouTube Marketing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, YouTube Development
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Video Editor for Female Self-Improvement Talking Head YouTube Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for an editor to clip my 8-12 minute talking head YouTube videos. Each raw video file is approximately 30 minutes long. The pay will be $30 for each completed video. There will be 3 videos per week.

For further information about the project check out this Google Doc file:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1GNcgd6c1irS97umYyN8bk-tqR5OITlSSws6Vcc8dgAg/edit?usp=drive_link

🔎 Looking for someone who will do the following:
✅ Clip videos to remove any silence and mistakes
✅ Understand English and ensure the videos will make sense to the viewer
✅ Add text overlays and b-roll to the videos to increase viewer engagement
✅ Adjust the color correction of the b-roll so it matches the rest of the video
✅ Render videos for the best quality on YouTube

This type of work should take about 5 hours per video.

💻 What to expect:
☑️ I will send over the 1080p footage as a Google Drive link (around 10GB each).
☑️ The first project will be a test project to determine your skills and if you are a good fit.
☑️ Instructions and files will be provided upon beginning the contract.
☑️ 3 videos per week is what I'm looking for, so about 15 hours per week

I'm looking to see how well we work together to determine if we are a good match for continued work.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 27, 2024 02:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Rendering, YouTube
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Rendering, YouTube
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Professional Pictures and Video for One Bedroom Apartment - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled photographer and videographer to capture high-quality pictures and videos of our one bedroom apartment. These visuals will be used to effectively market and showcase the property to potential tenants. The ideal candidate should have experience in real estate photography and videography, with a keen eye for detail and the ability to highlight the apartment's best features. The deliverables should include a set of professional photos and a well-edited video tour.
  Skills required:
  - Real estate photography
  - Videography
  - Attention to detail
  - Photo and video editing
  - Ability to highlight property features
  - Creative eye for composition and lighting
  - Strong communication skills
  Size: Medium
  Duration: Under 1 month
  Expertise: Intermediate
